root.name: Iron Front Liberation 1944
root.description: Overview Iron Front Liberation 1944 uses the ARMA II engine and is a realistic take on World War II. It features both infantry and vehicular combat. System Requirements OS:Windows XP, Windows Vista or Windows 7 Processor:Dual-core Intel Core 2.4 GHz or AMD Athlon 2.4 GHz Memory:1 GB RAM Graphics: Nvidia Geforce 8600GT or ATI Radeon 3650 or faster with Shader Model 3 and 512 MB VRAM Hard Drive:10 GB HD space
